atk-s0505a1:591_1: Te “pubbe kira mayaṁ ñātakā evā”ti ativiya pasīdiṁsu.
atk-s0505a1:591_3: koliyā aḍḍhateyyakumārasateti pañca kumārasate bhagavato parivāratthāya adaṁsu.
atk-s0505a1:591_4: Bhagavā tesaṁ pubbahetuṁ disvā “etha bhikkhavo”ti āha.
atk-s0505a1:591_5: Te sabbe iddhiyā nibbattaaṭṭhaparikkhārayuttā ākāse abbhuggantvā āgamma bhagavantaṁ vanditvā aṭṭhaṁsu.
atk-s0505a1:591_9: Bhagavā tesaṁ ukkaṇṭhitabhāvaṁ ñatvā himavantaṁ dassetvā tattha kuṇālajātakakathāya tesaṁ anabhiratiṁ vinodetukāmo āha –
atk-s0505a1:591_15: pekkhathā”ti attano iddhiyā te ākāsena nento “ayaṁ suvaṇṇapabbato,
atk-s0505a1:591_17: ayaṁ maṇipabbato”ti nānappakāre pabbate dassetvā kuṇāladahe manosilātale paccuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a1:591_18: Tato “himavante sabbe catuppadabahuppadādibhedā tiracchānagatā pāṇā āgacchantu,
atk-s0505a1:592_0: Te vimhitahadayā passantā sabbapacchato āgacchantaṁ dvīhi dijakaññāhi mukhatuṇḍakena ḍaṁsitvā gahitakaṭṭhavemajjhe
atk-s0505a1:592_1: nisinnaṁ sahassadijakaññāparivāraṁ kuṇālasakuṇaṁ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā bhagavantaṁ āhaṁsu –  “kacci, bhante,
atk-s0505a1:592_5: Atīte hi mayaṁ cattāro janā idha vasimhā –
atk-s0505a1:592_9: ahaṁ kuṇālo sakuṇo”ti sabbaṁ mahākuṇālajātakaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0505a1:592_10: Taṁ sutvā tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ purāṇadutiyikāyo ārabbha uppannā anabhirati vūpasantā.
atk-s0505a1:592_14: ekopi puthujjano vā arahā vā natthi.
atk-s0505a1:592_15: Tato bhagavā te ādāya punadeva mahāvane oruhi.
atk-s0505a1:592_16: Āgacchamānā ca te bhikkhū attanova iddhiyā āgacchiṁsu.
atk-s0505a1:593_0: Atha nesaṁ bhagavā uparimaggatthāya puna dhammaṁ desesi.
atk-s0505a1:593_1: Te pañcasatāpi vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṁsu.
atk-s0505a1:593_4: na ukkaṇṭhāmī”ti vatvā bhagavantaṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0505a1:593_5: Evaṁ te sabbepi anukkamena āgantvā bhagavantaṁ parivāretvā nisīdiṁsu jeṭṭhamāsauposathadivase sāyanhasamaye.
atk-s0505a1:593_6: Tato pañcasatakhīṇāsavaparivutaṁ varabuddhāsane nisinnaṁ bhagavantaṁ ṭhapetvā asaññasatte ca arūpabrahmāno
atk-s0505a1:593_7: ca sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷe avasesadevatādayo maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttanayena sukhumattabhāve nimminitvā
atk-s0505a1:593_9: Tattha cattāro khīṇāsavabrahmāno samāpattito vuṭṭhāya brahmagaṇaṁ apassantā “kuhiṁ gatā”ti āvajjetvā
atk-s0505a1:593_10: tamatthaṁ ñatvā pacchā āgantvā okāsaṁ alabhamānā cakkavāḷamuddhani ṭhatvā paccekagāthāyo abhāsiṁsu. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a1:594_0: “Atha kho catunnaṁ suddhāvāsakāyikānaṁ devatānaṁ etadahosi – ‘ayaṁ, kho,
atk-s0505a1:594_1: bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ mahāvane mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi.
atk-s0505a1:594_2: Dasahi ca lokadhātūhi devatā yebhuyyena sannipatitā honti bhagavantaṁ dassanāya bhikkhusaṅghañca.
atk-s0505a1:594_4: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike paccekaṁ gāthaṁ bhāseyyāmā”’ti.
atk-s0505a1:595_1: Evaṁ gantvā ca tattha eko brahmā puratthimacakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṁ labhitvā tattha ṭhito imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a1:598_0: Imañcassa gāthaṁ bhāsamānassa pacchimacakkavāḷapabbate ṭhito saddaṁ assosi.
atk-s0505a1:599_0: Dutiyo pacchimacakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṁ labhitvā tattha ṭhito taṁ gāthaṁ sutvā imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a1:602_0: Tatiyo dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṁ labhitvā tattha ṭhito taṁ gāthaṁ sutvā imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a1:604_0: Catuttho uttaracakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṁ labhitvā tattha ṭhito taṁ gāthaṁ sutvā imaṁ gāthamabhāsi –
atk-s0505a1:607_0: Tassapi taṁ saddaṁ dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamuddhani ṭhito assosi.
atk-s0505a1:607_1: Evaṁ tadā ime cattāro brahmāno parisaṁ thometvā ṭhitā ahesuṁ,
atk-s0505a1:608_0: Atha bhagavā devaparisaṁ oloketvā bhikkhūnaṁ ārocesi – “yepi te,
atk-s0505a1:608_3: tesampi bhagavantānaṁ etapparamāyeva devatā sannipatitā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0505a1:608_7: tesampi bhagavantānaṁ etapparamāyeva devatā sannipatitā bhavissanti seyyathāpi mayhaṁ etarahī”ti.
atk-s0505a1:608_8: Tato taṁ devaparisaṁ bhabbābhabbavasena dvidhā vibhaji “ettakā bhabbā,
atk-s0505a1:608_10: Tattha “abhabbaparisā buddhasatepi dhammaṁ desente na bujjhati,
atk-s0505a1:608_11: bhabbaparisā sakkā bodhetu”nti ñatvā puna bhabbapuggale cariyavasena chadhā vibhaji “ettakā rāgacaritā,
atk-s0505a1:608_14: Evaṁ cariyavasena pariggahetvā “assā parisāya kīdisā dhammadesanā sappāyā”ti dhammakathaṁ vicinitvā puna taṁ parisaṁ manasākāsi –
atk-s0505a1:608_19: Tato “pucchāvasena jāneyyā”ti ñatvā “pañhaṁ pucchituṁ samattho atthi,
atk-s0505a1:608_20: natthī”ti puna sakalaparisaṁ āvajjetvā “natthi kocī”ti ñatvā “sace ahameva pucchitvā ahameva vissajjeyyaṁ,
atk-s0505a1:608_22: Yaṁnūnāhaṁ nimmitabuddhaṁ māpeyyanti pādakajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya manomayiddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā nimmitabuddhaṁ māpesi.
atk-s0505a1:608_23: Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī lakkhaṇasampanno pattacīvaradharo ālokitavilokitādisampanno hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānacittena saha pāturahosi.
atk-s0505a1:608_24: So pācīnalokadhātuto āgantvā bhagavato samasame āsane nisinno evaṁ āgantvā yāni bhagavatā imamhi samāgame cariyavasena cha suttāni kathitāni.
atk-s0505a1:608_26: purābhedasuttaṁ kalahavivādasuttaṁ cūḷabyūhaṁ mahābyūhaṁ tuvaṭakaṁ idameva sammāparibbājanīyanti.
atk-s0505a1:608_27: Tesu rāgacaritadevatānaṁ sappāyavasena kathetabbassa imassa suttassa pavattanatthaṁ pañhaṁ pucchanto “pucchāmi muniṁ pahūtapañña”nti imaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a1:609_5: Nikkhamma gharā panujja kāmeti vatthukāme panuditvā gharāvāsā nikkhamma.
atk-s0505a1:609_6: Kathaṁ bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyyāti so bhikkhu kathaṁ loke sammā paribbajeyya vihareyya anupalitto lokena hutvā,
atk-s0505a1:610_1: Atha bhagavā yasmā āsavakkhayaṁ appatvā loke sammā paribbajanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0505a1:610_2: tasmā tasmiṁ rāgacaritādivasena pariggahite sabbapuggalasamūhe taṁ taṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ samānadosānaṁ devatāgaṇānaṁ
atk-s0505a1:610_3: āciṇṇadosappahānatthaṁ “yassa maṅgalā”ti ārabhitvā arahattanikūṭeneva khīṇāsavapaṭipadaṁ pakāsento pannarasa
atk-s0505a1:611_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva maṅgalāti maṅgalasutte vuttānaṁ diṭṭhamaṅgalādīnametaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
atk-s0505a1:611_2: Uppātāti “ukkāpātadisāḍāhādayo evaṁ vipākā hontī”ti evaṁ pavattā uppātābhinivesā.
atk-s0505a1:611_3: Supināti “pubbaṇhasamaye supinaṁ disvā idaṁ nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a1:611_5: vāmapassena sayatā diṭṭhe idaṁ nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a1:611_7: supinante candaṁ disvā idaṁ nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a1:611_8: sūriyādayo disvā ida”nti evaṁ pavattā supinābhinivesā.
atk-s0505a1:611_9: Lakkhaṇāti daṇḍalakkhaṇavatthalakkhaṇādipāṭhaṁ paṭhitvā “iminā idaṁ nāma hotī”ti evaṁ pavattā lakkhaṇābhinivesā.
atk-s0505a1:611_11: So maṅgaladosavippahīnoti aṭṭhatiṁsa mahāmaṅgalāni ṭhapetvā avasesā maṅgaladosā nāma.
atk-s0505a1:611_14: Atha vā maṅgalānañca uppātādidosānañca pahīnattā maṅgaladosavippahīno hoti,
atk-s0505a1:611_15: na maṅgalādīhi suddhiṁ pacceti ariyamaggassa adhigatattā.
atk-s0505a1:611_17: so khīṇāsavo sammā loke paribbajeyya anupalitto lokenāti.
atk-s0505a1:612_2: dibbesu kāmesu cāpi bhikkhūti mānusesu ca dibbesu ca kāmaguṇesu anāgāmimaggena anuppattidhammataṁ nento rāgaṁ vinayetha.
atk-s0505a1:612_3: Atikkamma bhavaṁ samecca dhammanti evaṁ rāgaṁ vinetvā tato paraṁ arahattamaggena sabbappakārato pariññābhisamayādayo
atk-s0505a1:612_4: sādhento catusaccabhedampi samecca dhammaṁ imāya paṭipadāya tividhampi atikkamma bhavaṁ.
atk-s0505a1:612_5: Sammā soti sopi bhikkhu sammā loke paribbajeyya.
atk-s0505a1:613_2: Sesaṁ vuttanayameva sabbagāthāsu ca “sopi bhikkhu sammā loke paribbajeyyā”ti yojetabbaṁ.
atk-s0505a1:613_3: Ito parañhi yojanampi avatvā avuttanayameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0505a1:614_1: Catutthagāthāya sattasaṅkhāravasena duvidhaṁ piyañca appiyañca veditabbaṁ,
atk-s0505a1:614_3: Anupādāyāti catūhi upādānehi kañci dhammaṁ aggahetvā.
atk-s0505a1:614_4: Anissitokuhiñcīti aṭṭhasatabhedena taṇhānissayena dvāsaṭṭhibhedena diṭṭhinissayena ca kuhiñci rūpādidhamme bhave vā anissito.
atk-s0505a1:614_5: Saṁyojaniyehi vippamuttoti sabbepi tebhūmakadhammā dasavidhasaṁyojanassa visayattā saṁyojaniyā,
atk-s0505a1:614_6: tehi sabbappakārato maggabhāvanāya pariññātattā ca vippamuttoti attho.
atk-s0505a1:614_12: tatiyena tesaṁ pahīnattā saṁyojaniyehi vippamokkhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a1:615_3: Anaññaneyyoti aniccādīnaṁ sudiṭṭhattā “idaṁ seyyo”ti kenaci anetabbo.
atk-s0505a1:615_6: ādānesu catutthamaggena sabbaso chandarāgaṁ vinetvā so vinītachandarāgo,
atk-s0505a1:615_9: Tato tesu duvidhenapi nissayena anissito aññena vā kenaci “idaṁ seyyo”ti anetabbo khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
atk-s0505a1:616_1: Chaṭṭhagāthāya aviruddhoti etesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ duccaritānaṁ pahīnattā sucaritehi saddhiṁ aviruddho.
atk-s0505a1:617_2: Na sandhiyethāti na upanayhetha na kuppeyya.
atk-s0505a1:617_3: Laddhā parabhojanaṁna majjeti parehi dinnaṁ saddhādeyyaṁ labhitvā “ahaṁ ñāto yasassī lābhī”ti na majjeyya.
atk-s0505a1:618_6: Virato chedanabandhanā cāti evametesaṁ kammakilesānaṁ pahīnattā parasattachedanabandhanā ca viratoti.
atk-s0505a1:619_1: Navamagāthāya sāruppaṁ attano viditvāti attano bhikkhubhāvassa patirūpaṁ anesanādiṁ pahāya sammāesanādiājīvasuddhiṁ
atk-s0505a1:620_1: Dasamagāthāya so nirāso anāsisānoti yassa ariyamaggena vināsitattā anusayā ca na santi,
atk-s0505a1:620_4: Tato āsāya abhāvena kañci rūpādidhammaṁ nāsīsati.
atk-s0505a1:621_5: Dantoti sabbadvāravisevanaṁ hitvā ariyena damathena dantabhūmiṁ patto.
atk-s0505a1:622_1: Dvādasamagāthāya saddhoti buddhādiguṇesu parappaccayavirahitattā sabbākārasampannena aveccappasādena samannāgato,
atk-s0505a1:622_2: na parassa saddhāya paṭipattiyaṁ gamanabhāvena. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a1:622_3: “na khvāhaṁ ettha bhante bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a1:622_5: Niyāmadassīti saṁsārakantāramūḷhe loke amatapuragāmino sammattaniyāmabhūtassa maggassa dassāvī,
atk-s0505a1:622_7: Vaggagatesu na vaggasārīti vaggagatā nāma dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatikā aññamaññaṁ paṭilomattā,
atk-s0505a1:622_8: evaṁ vaggāhi diṭṭhīhi gatesu sattesu na vaggasārī –
atk-s0505a1:622_10: idaṁ tatheva bhavissatī”ti evaṁ diṭṭhivasena agamanato.
atk-s0505a1:623_4: Na hissa sakkā te dhammā yathā ñātā kenaci aññathā kātuṁ,
atk-s0505a1:623_6: Pāragūti pāraṁ vuccati nibbānaṁ, taṁ gato,
atk-s0505a1:624_1: Cuddasamagāthāya atītesūti pavattiṁ patvā atikkantesu pañcakkhandhesu.
atk-s0505a1:624_3: Kappātītoti “ahaṁ mama”nti kappanaṁ sabbampi vā taṇhādiṭṭhikappaṁ atīto.
atk-s0505a1:624_8: Arahā hi yvāyaṁ avijjāsaṅkhārasaṅkhāto atīto addhā,
atk-s0505a1:624_11: taṁ sabbampi atikkamma kaṅkhaṁ vitaritvā paramasuddhippattapañño hutvā ṭhito.
atk-s0505a1:624_15: Kappātītattā aticca suddhipaññattā ca āyatiṁ na kiñci āyatanaṁ upeti. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a1:625_1: Pannarasamagāthāya aññāya padanti ye te “saccānaṁ caturo padā”ti vuttā,
atk-s0505a1:625_3: Samecca dhammanti tato paraṁ catūhi ariyamaggehi catusaccadhammaṁ samecca.
atk-s0505a1:625_4: Vivaṭaṁ disvāna pahānamāsavānanti atha paccavekkhaṇañāṇena āsavakkhayasaññitaṁ nibbānaṁ vivaṭaṁ pākaṭamanāvaṭaṁ disvā.
atk-s0505a1:625_5: Sabbupadhīnaṁ parikkhayāti sabbesaṁ khandhakāmaguṇakilesābhisaṅkhārabhedānaṁ upadhīnaṁ parikkhīṇattā
atk-s0505a1:625_6: katthaci asajjamāno bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyya vihareyya,
atk-s0505a1:626_1: Tato so nimmito dhammadesanaṁ thomento “addhā hi bhagavā”ti imaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a1:626_2: Tattha yo so evaṁ vihārīti yo so maṅgalādīni samūhanitvā sabbamaṅgaladosappahānavihārī,
atk-s0505a1:626_3: yopi so dibbamānusakesu kāmesu rāgaṁ vineyya bhavātikkamma dhammābhisamayavihārīti evaṁ tāya tāya gāthāya niddiṭṭhabhikkhuṁ dassento āha.
atk-s0505a1:626_6: addhā hi bhagavā tatheva etaṁ yaṁ tvaṁ “yassa maṅgalā samūhatā”tiādīni vatvā tassā tassā gāthāya pariyosāne “sammā so loke paribbajeyyā”ti avaca.
atk-s0505a1:626_10: sabbāni ca dasapi saṁyojanāni caturo ca yoge vītivatto hoti.
atk-s0505a1:626_12: natthi me ettha vicikicchāti iti desanāthomanagāthampi vatvā arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṁ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a1:631_2: Tiṭṭhamāne kira bhagavati lokanāthe dhammiko nāma upāsako ahosi nāmena ca paṭipattiyā ca.
atk-s0505a1:631_3: So kira saraṇasampanno sīlasampanno bahussuto piṭakattayadharo anāgāmī abhiññālābhī ākāsacārī ahosi.
atk-s0505a1:631_6: Tassekadivasaṁ uposathikassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa majjhimayāmāvasānasamaye evaṁ parivitakko udapādi –
atk-s0505a1:631_8: So pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṁ pucchi,
atk-s0505a1:632_1: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva kathaṁkaroti kathaṁ karonto kathaṁ paṭipajjanto.
atk-s0505a1:632_2: Sādhu hotīti sundaro anavajjo atthasādhano hoti.
atk-s0505a1:632_8: etesu duvidhesu sāvakesu kathaṁkaro sāvako sādhu hotīti.
atk-s0505a1:633_1: Idāni evaṁ puṭṭhassa bhagavato byākaraṇasamatthataṁ dīpento “tuvañhī”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a1:633_5: Parāyaṇanti gatito paraṁ ayanaṁ gativippamokkhaṁ parinibbānaṁ,
atk-s0505a1:633_6: na catthi tulyoti tayā sadiso natthi.
atk-s0505a1:633_8: pakāsesi satte anukampamānoti tvaṁ bhagavā yadatthi ñeyyaṁ nāma,
atk-s0505a1:633_9: taṁ anavasesaṁ avecca paṭivijjhitvā satte anukampamāno sabbaṁ ñāṇañca dhammañca pakāsesi.
atk-s0505a1:633_12: na te atthi ācariyamuṭṭhīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0505a1:634_1: Idāni yesaṁ tadā bhagavā dhammaṁ desesi,
atk-s0505a1:634_2: te devaputte kittetvā bhagavantaṁ pasaṁsanto “āgañchī te santike”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a1:634_3: Tattha nāgarājā erāvaṇo nāmāti ayaṁ kira erāvaṇo nāma devaputto kāmarūpī dibbe vimāne vasati.
atk-s0505a1:634_5: tadā diyaḍḍhasatayojanaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimminitvā tettiṁsa kumbhe māpetvā erāvaṇo nāma hatthī hoti.
atk-s0505a1:634_6: Tassa ekekasmiṁ kumbhe dve dve dantā honti,
atk-s0505a1:634_11: ekekasmiṁ patte satta satta accharāyo naccanti padumaccharāyotveva vissutā sakkassa nāṭakitthiyo,
atk-s0505a1:634_12: yā ca vimānavatthusmimpi “bhamanti kaññā padumesu sikkhitā”ti āgatā.
atk-s0505a1:634_13: Tesaṁ pana tettisaṁkumbhānaṁ majjhe sudassanakumbho nāma tiṁsayojanamatto hoti,
atk-s0505a1:634_14: tattha yojanappamāṇo maṇipallaṅko tiyojanubbedhe pupphamaṇḍape attharīyati.
atk-s0505a1:634_15: Tattha sakko devānamindo accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbasampattiṁ paccanubhoti.
atk-s0505a1:634_16: Sakke pana devānaminde uyyānakīḷāto paṭinivatte puna taṁ rūpaṁ saṁharitvāna devaputtova hoti.
atk-s0505a1:634_19: Jinoti sutvāti “vijitapāpadhammo esa bhagavā”ti evaṁ sutvā.
atk-s0505a1:634_20: Sopi tayā mantayitvāti tayā saddhiṁ mantayitvā,
